mapper.sql:
select ui.password , ci.commission_info_id , ci.total_earnings , ui.member_level_id , ci.commission_ratio , ui.phone_number , ci.user_info_user_info_id_3 , ui.email , ui.username
FROM commission_info ci left join user_info ui on ci.user_info_user_info_id_3 = ui.user_info_id
mapper.select:
select ui.password , ci.commission_info_id , ci.total_earnings , ui.member_level_id , ci.commission_ratio , ui.phone_number , ci.user_info_user_info_id_3 , ui.email , ui.username
FROM commission_info ci left join
user_info
ui on ci.user_info_user_info_id_3 = ui.user_info_id
${ew.customSqlSegment}
